projects.name: Nice To Meet You
projects.description: Event application made for the cosmetic brand Sisley at Gobelins. The purpose is to try to seduce you...

projects.name: Call To Make
projects.description: An Electron application based on an Arduino, Raspberry PI and a rotary phone. The phone acts as device to reach the features of the app.

projects.name: Star Christmas
projects.description: A little game based on the Star Wars universe in WebGL. Made with Robin Delaporte.

projects.name: Bienvenue Dans Mon Hybride
projects.description: A web application for Toyota which let their users to share about the hybrid cars.

projects.name: Equalizer Galaxy
projects.description: A WebGL project realized at Gobelins. The render reacts to the audio by using the HTML Web Audio API. Our projects were rewarded by FWA & Awwwards

projects.name: Equalizer
projects.description: My first test with the HTML Web Audio API and WebGL.

projects.name: Dragon Ball Ki
projects.description: One of my first WebGL experiment. I couple the best manga in the world (and the surrounding planets) with Three.js.

projects.name: Math&Malice
projects.description: An educative iPad game realized at Gobelins for the 7-8 years old learning mathematics.

projects.name: Touaregs Agency Website
projects.description: The website of the digital web agency Touaregs based in Paris.

projects.name: SNCF
projects.description: A web application realized at Gobelins with the SNCF. By using false datas, we show the influx in stations.
